item.description:
Come out and have some fun on Saturday night at the Breakers Restaurant inside the Ashworth Hotel.  If you like, come early and have something to eat or just sit and talk.  

The DJ that doesn't mind taking requests so bring your dancing shoes! The DJ starts playing at 9:00 and runs until 1:00.

When your needing a break to cool down or just to relax, you can walk down the beach and enjoy the breezes and the full moon that night!  

I will let the host/hostess know where the group is sitting so if your new, just ask for the Meetup group and they will make sure you get to the right table!  Hope to see you there :)

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Ashworth by the Sea - Dinner/Dancing
